author: A D
text:
A transgender has been appointed school noon meal organiser in the Kilpennathur block of Tiruvannamalai.

Jayaprakash alias Jaya (23), hailing from Sirunathur village near here has been appointed in the Panchayat Union Primary School in Erppakkam village in Keelpennathur block.

District Collector A.Gnanasekaran presented the appointment order to Jaya here on Thursday in the presence of District Revenue Officer S.Palani.

Jaya told reporters, “I studied Plus Two in Kilpennathur Boys Higher Secondary School and joined B.A. History in Government Arts College, Tiruvannamalai in 2010. When I was studying class X, my parents started observing that I behave differently. Initially, I was advised to not to behave in that way. But as time progressed I faced neglect and finally my parents stopped supporting me. Hence, I had to give up my studies when I was in second year of my graduation”.

“After leaving college I was leading my life by collecting money from shops. I never liked that. I wanted to earn by working. I approached several shops and even a petrol bunk for a job but in vain. The job I now have gives me immense pleasure,” she said.
title: Transgender appointed noon meal organiser
